name: Vanger
description:
Virtual Planet. Digital Currency. Scavenge.
How much Loot can you claim?

###

Controls:

  • Move with W, A, S, D
  • Slash with Mouse1
  • Dash with Space

We are a two man team, and aside from a one week project to get our feet wet with Unity, this is our first finished game and entry to the Beginners Jam #3! We implemented what we could in the given timeframe, but of course many features that we would've loved to show of needed to be cut.
But however that may be - we truly learned a ton and wouldn't want to have missed this experience.

Thanks to everybody who trys out the game, let alone finish it! Have fun!
